title: What's My Job?
subtle: Realistic (fiction), 61 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 150L
description: In What's My Job? a girl explores the careers of women she knows as she thinks about what job she would like to have someday. Will she become a doctor, a construction worker, an artist, or something else? Detailed, supportive illustrations, high-frequency words, and repetitive phrases support early emergent readers.
meta: art, boss, drives, jobs, teacher, women
Ask and answer questions to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /w/ sound
Alphabetical Order : Arrange words in alphabetical order

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
